foot of a mountain, plain at the foot of a mountain
sharing with others what has been given to you, sharing a portion of the profit with others
cuff (of pants), hem (of skirt), train (of dress), foot (of mountain)
supporting industries, component and parts-supply industries
sharing with others what has been given to you, sharing a portion of the profit with others

sdata.j: カレンの↑裾↑↓すそ↓が↑捲↑↓まく↓れている。
↑和服↑↓わふく↓を↑着↑↓き↓て↑椅子↑↓いす↓に↑腰↑↓こし↓をかけると、↑何↑↓なん↓となく↑心細↑↓こころぼそ↓い。↑裾↑↓すそ↓から↑風↑↓かぜ↓がはひるやうな↑気↑↓き↓がする。
sdata.e: I feel somewhat uneasy when I sit on a chair with Japanese clothes. I feel like the wind is blowing in from the cuff of my trousers.

sdata.j: ↑和服↑↓わふく↓を↑着↑↓き↓て↑椅子↑↓いす↓に↑腰↑↓こし↓をかけると、↑何↑↓なん↓となく↑心細↑↓こころぼそ↓い。↑裾↑↓すそ↓から↑風↑↓かぜ↓がはいるような↑気↑↓き↓がする。
sdata.e: I feel somewhat uneasy when I sit on a chair with Japanese clothes. I feel like the wind is blowing in from the cuff of my trousers.

sdata.j: ↑山裾↑↓やますそ↓にはたくさんの↑花↑↓はな↓があります。
sdata.e: There are many flowers at the base of the mountain.

sdata.j: ↑山裾↑↓やますそ↓にはたくさんの↑花↑↓はな↓があります。
sdata.e: There are many flowers at the foot of the mountain.

sdata.j: その↑街↑↓まち↓は↑山裾↑↓やますそ↓にあります。
sdata.e: The city is located at the foot of the mountain.

sdata.j: ↑山裾↑↓やますそ↓に↑古城↑↓こじょう↓があります。
sdata.e: There is an old castle at the foot of the mountain.

sdata.j: ↑山裾↑↓やますそ↓に↑古城↑↓こじょう↓があります。
sdata.e: There's an old castle at the foot of the mountain.
